name: Disaster Deli
description:
Stack up sandwiches to meet customer requests. The bigger your sandwich get the more easily it can topple over, but the more your customers are willing to pay for it. Give your patrons sandwiches that include their requested ingredients without any of the ones that they dislike. 

CONTROLS

Arrows - move

Space - turn in sandwich

Escape - pause

Mouse for menu navigation

CREDITS

William Beaty - Programming

Noah Bowers - Art and Sound
